channel.title: A Reason to Wake Up, April 2020
channel.description: Daniel Kitson - live on air at 7am till 9am. This is an unofficial feed.

item.title: April 20, 2020
item.description:
Originally broadcast on Resonance FM 7 to 9 p.m., October 2, 2016
Tracklist:
01. Jeffrey Lewis - Sad Screaming Old Man 02. Jeb Loy Nichols - Going Where the Lonely Go 03. Courtney Barnett - Depreston 04. John Grant - Snug Slacks 05. Sufjan Stevens - Should Have Known Better 06. Connie Converse - Roving Woman 07. Nadia Rose - Skwod 08. tUnE-yArDs - My Country 09. Darren Hanlon - When You Go (Radio Edit) 10. Huw M - Worries Now Won't Be Worried Long 11. Four Tet - A Joy 12. Emmy the Great - Swimming Pool (feat. Tom Fleming) 13. Richard Dawson - Poor Old Horse 14. Diagrams - Tall Buildings 15. Bon Iver - 22 (OVER S∞∞N) 16. LCD Soundsystem - North American Scum 17. Talking Heads - Road to Nowhere 18. Chip Zien, Kim Crosby, Ben Wright & Danielle Ferland - No One Is Alone 19.
